sentences.english: I have also asked some people to help me with opening and closing the church and the gates for parking.
sentences.chinese: 我已经委讬了一些教友帮忙打点圣堂和泊车闸门开关。

sentences.english: On the day we left our old home town, we had a going away lunch with our friends from church.
sentences.chinese: 离开老家的那天，我们和教友一起吃了饯行午餐。

sentences.english: One of the couple planning to get married must be our registered parishioner who attends our church regularly.
sentences.chinese: 预备结婚的男方或女方必须为本堂已注册的热心教友。

sentences.english: Therefore the pope suggested the ancestor place church member committee prepares the world youth date activity.
sentences.chinese: 于是教宗建议宗座教友委员会筹办世界青年日活动。

sentences.english: Then he prostrates himself and kisses the brethren's knees (On Repentance 9 – 12).
sentences.chinese: 然后他匍匐地上，亲吻教友的膝盖。

sentences.english: The bell exactly metaphorizes a wakening and summon to converses.
sentences.chinese: 而“钟”的形式恰好隐喻了对教友的唤醒和号召。

sentences.english: The chaplain came and preaches to a packed church.
sentences.chinese: 牧师来了，向济济一堂的教友们布了道。
查禁教友派信徒和女巫。

sentences.english: In Seattle, Mars Hill churchgoers regularly tweet throughout the service.
sentences.chinese: 在西雅图，火星山的教友们时常通过微博客讨论交流。

sentences.english: My mother was a Seventh-Day Adventist and took my sister and me every Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲是一个基督复临安息日会教友。

sentences.english: We need to motivate members to do missionary work.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须策励教友传教的工作。

sentences.english: The arrival of this stranger at the base of the obelisk was asignal from the brotherhood.
sentences.chinese: 陌生人来到方尖碑的基座边是教友们发出的信号。

sentences.english: In 1987, the faithful rebuilt the church with their own money and labour.
sentences.chinese: 教友们出钱出力，于1987年重修教堂。
